content: bobo the sea cow no sew by muninn81 is it a cow is it a manatee it s both it s a sea cow general ● us terminology ● rounds are worked in spiral do not join rounds with slip_stitch ● finished version will vary depending on yarn and hook size used materials ● yarn black white pink and brown i used big twist posh ● hook i used 6 0 mm abbreviations and stitches ● single_crochet = single_crochet ● magic_ring = magic_ring ● chain = chain ● double_crochet = double_crochet ● increase = increase = make 2 single_crochet in the same stitch ● decrease = decrease = 2 single_crochet together i use the invisible decrease method insert hook into front loop of next two stitches pull up a loop yarn over and pull through both loops ● around = repeat the specified stitches until you reach the end of the round ● flo = front loop only pattern 1 start in pink 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 blo this round 2 single_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 12 4 single_crochet around 12 this forms the nose switch to white at end of round 5 in white flo increase around 24 6 3 single_crochet increase around 30 7 single_crochet around 30 8 9 single_crochet change to black ear in flo single_crochet chain 3 in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet single_crochet in next chain single_crochet in same front loop change to white single_crochet change to brown horn in flo slip_stitch chain 3 in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch slip_stitch in next chain slip_stitch in same front loop change to white 5 single_crochet change to brown horn change to white single_crochet change to black ear change to white 4 single_crochet change to black 3 single_crochet change to white 3 single_crochet 30 including ears and horns 9 5 single_crochet fin chain 5 in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in last chain slip_stitch in same stitch as single_crochet on body 18 single_crochet change to black 2 single_crochet fin 3 single_crochet change to white 2 single_crochet 30 plus 2 fins work in the back loops from the flo stitches on previous round 10 23 single_crochet change to black 5 single_crochet change to white 2 single_crochet 30 11 23 single_crochet change to black 5 single_crochet change to white 2 single_crochet 30 12 8 single_crochet change to black 5 single_crochet change to white 11 single_crochet change to black 3 single_crochet change to white 3 single_crochet 30 13 7 single_crochet change to black 7 single_crochet change to white 16 single_crochet 30 14 6 single_crochet change to black 9 single_crochet change to white 15 single_crochet 30 15 6 single_crochet change to black 9 single_crochet change to white 15 single_crochet 30 16 7 single_crochet change to black 7 single_crochet change to white 16 single_crochet 30 insert eyes here one row up from the snout 5 stitches apart sew 2 small lines in black to make snout 17 8 single_crochet change to black
